EmailTemplate.Subject: VOD publishing successfully - {#Content.Name}
EmailTemplate.Body: Content {#Content.Name} with id {#Content.Id} successfully published to service {#Service.Name} with id {#Service.Id}.

EmailTemplate.Subject: VOD publishing failed - {#Content.Name}
EmailTemplate.Body: Content {#Content.Name} with id {#Content.Id} couldn't be published to service {#Service.Name} with id {#Service.Id}. {#ErrorMessage}
